name: constrict
effect: Inflicts regular damage. Has a 10% chance to lower the target’s Speed by one stage.
short_effect: Has a 10% chance to lower the target’s Speed by one stage.

flavor_text.sun_moon: The target is attacked with long, creeping tentacles, vines, or the like. This may also lower the target’s Speed stat.
flavor_text.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: The target is attacked with long, creeping tentacles, vines, or the like. This may also lower the target’s Speed stat.
flavor_text.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: The target is attacked with long, creeping tentacles, vines, or the like. This may also lower the target’s Speed stat.
